EmailTemplate.subject: {!Contact.FirstName}, NCS Rally is almost here! DETAILS
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hey Grads,
Thanks for signing up to the NCS Sales Rally! This email will let you know all the details for the day and what you need to bring.
The Project
Being part of our NCS Sales Rally, you will be helping promote NCS and get other young people to sign up and get involved! Gather your best stories and memories from your NCS experience and come along to help market our programme! This project will take place between 11am to 3pm outside Barclays on Clarence Street in Kingston.
The Celebration
Being involved in this social action project means you have earned free tickets for the NCS Action Day celebration event and gig taking place in Conway Hall after your project from 4pm to 8pm! You will be travelling from Kingston to Conway Hall with your mentor.
The Details
Date: 5th March (THIS SATURDAY) Time: 11am - 3pm Location: Outside Barclays Kingston. 6 Clarence St, Kingston upon Thames KT1 1NY Your mentor on the day is Jo, please call her on the day if you are having any issues Her number is 07584503792.
Things to bring
- Lunch & oyster cards
Lastly, make sure you let your friends know about it and we'll see you at the celebration.
The Core Grad Team
